panels.description: Volumes Protected With Snapshot Copies (local).

targets.expr: count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*", volume!~"MDV.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{})) OR on() vector(0)

count((volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy=~"none.*", volume!~"MDV.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{}))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Protected Status

panels.description: Total number of volumes that are protected.

targets.expr: count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*", volume!~"MDV.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{})) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Volumes protected

panels.description: Volumes Breaching Snapshot Copy Reserve Space.

targets.expr: count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{}) * on (volume, svm, cluster) group_right() ( volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} > volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"})) OR on() vector(0)

(count((volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{})) * on (volume, svm, cluster) group_right() (volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} <= volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"})) OR on() vector(0)) + (count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{}) * on (volume, svm, cluster) group_right() ( volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} == 0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Breached Status

panels.description: Total number of volumes whose snapshot size used is breached the snapshot reserve size.

targets.expr: count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{}) * on (volume, svm, cluster) group_right() ( volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} > volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"})) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Volumes breached

panels.description: Total number of volumes that are not protected.

targets.expr: count((volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy=~"none.*", volume!~"MDV.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{}))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Volumes not protected

panels.description: Total number of volumes whose snapshot size used is not breached the snapshot reserve size.

targets.expr: (count((volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{})) * on (volume, svm, cluster) group_right() (volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} > 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} > 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} <= volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"})) OR on() vector(0)) + (count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{}) * on (volume, svm, cluster) group_right() ( volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} == 0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Volumes not breached

panels.description: This panel displays volumes detail with protected status and snapshot policy.

targets.expr: label_replace(label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", snapshot_policy!="", volume!~"MDV.*"}, "Status", "Protected", "snapshot_policy", "(.*)") , "Status", "Unprotected", "snapshot_policy", "(none.*)") * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{})

panels.title: Volumes Protected With Snapshot Copies (local)

panels.description: Volumes details of snapshot copy reserve space.

targets.expr: volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{}) * on (volume, svm, cluster) group_right() ( volume_snapshot_reserve_size{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0 and volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 0)
volume_snapshots_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster"}

panels.title: Volumes Breaching Snapshot Copy Reserve Space

panels.description: Total number of volumes whose snapshot count is < 10.

targets.expr: count((volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*", volume!~"MDV.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"})) * on (volume,svm,cluster) (volume_snapshot_count{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} > 0 and volume_snapshot_count{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} < 10)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: <10 Copies

panels.description: Total number of volumes whose snapshot count is between 10 to 100.

targets.expr: count((volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*", volume!~"MDV.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"})) * on (volume,svm,cluster) (volume_snapshot_count{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} >= 10 and volume_snapshot_count{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} <= 100)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: 10-100 Copies

panels.description: Total number of volumes whose snapshot count is between 101 to 500.

targets.expr: count((volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*", volume!~"MDV.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"})) * on (volume,svm,cluster) (volume_snapshot_count{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} > 100 and volume_snapshot_count{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} <= 500)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: 101-500 Copies

panels.description: Total number of volumes whose snapshot count is > 500.

targets.expr: count((volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*", volume!~"MDV.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"})) * on (volume,svm,cluster) (volume_snapshot_count{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} > 500)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: >500 Copies

panels.description: This panel displays volumes detail with snapshot count.

targets.expr: (volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",snapshot_policy!="", snapshot_policy!~"none.*", volume!~"MDV.*"}  * on (snapshot_policy) group_left () group by (snapshot_policy) (snapshot_policy_total_schedules{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"})) * on (volume,svm,cluster) (volume_snapshot_count{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} > 0)
